mapper.select: SELECT a.c_id, a.u_id, a.o_dt, b.name, b.addr, b.phone, c.c_business, IFNULL(d.file_id, '') AS file_id, IFNULL(d.file_name, '') AS file_name, IFNULL(d.file_ext, '') AS file_ext, IFNULL(d.file_url, '') AS file_url FROM tbl_offer a LEFT JOIN tbl_user b ON a.u_id = b.id LEFT JOIN tbl_company c ON a.c_id = c.id LEFT JOIN tbl_file d ON a.c_id = d.file_ref_id AND d.file_gbn_cd = '10' WHERE use_yn = 'Y' AND a.u_id = #{id} AND b.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') GROUP BY a.c_id ORDER BY a.o_dt DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit};

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM (SELECT a.c_id FROM tbl_offer a LEFT JOIN tbl_user b ON a.u_id = b.id LEFT JOIN tbl_company c ON a.c_id = c.id LEFT JOIN tbl_file d ON a.c_id = d.file_ref_id AND d.file_gbn_cd = '10' WHERE use_yn = 'Y' AND a.u_id = #{id} AND b.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') GROUP BY a.c_id ) AS f;
